channel.title: Job Hunting on Aditya Bhardwaj
channel.description: Recent content in Job Hunting on Aditya Bhardwaj

item.title: Job Hunting Day 1
item.description: It is 7:44 P.M. at the time of writing. I had a long day working on the presentation for my thesis. I added content on Shortest Vector Problem (SVP) and Shortest Integer Solution (SIS) which are important concepts in lattice-based cryptography. Though I am sure I added the important parts I will also refer to these notes for a better understanding. The next thing to do is to add the ROS attack.
